About Automic's Apache HTTP Server Package ================================ This package provides the integration with Apache HTTP Server. The Apache HTTP Server provides HTTP services in sync with the current HTTP standards. This package provides the following functionalities: * Install and uninstall apache HTTP server on a Windows platform. * Manage apache HTTP server: Start, Stop and Restart. * Execute any apache command on server.
=Supported versions= Apache HTTP Server version 2.4
=Limitations= (none)
=Setup= * Oracle JRE 1.7 or higher must be installed on Agent OS and "java" must be set as executable on the same. * To run the action on Windows, Apache HTTP server executable httpd must be present on the corresponding agent OS. * To run the action on UNIX, apachectl script must be present on the corresponding agent OS. * Required configuration file(s) for HTTP Server must also be present on agent OS.
=Variables= PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_HTTPSERVER.PUB.VARA.PACKAGE_PARAMETERS * DEFAULT_SERVICE_NAME: Windows service name to be used when user does not specify one in promptset while running actions on windows agent. The default value is apache2.4
=Actions=
Following actions are supported: * Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_HTTPSERVER.PUB.ACTION.INSTALL_SERVICE_WINDOWS * Action Description: This action installs the Apache HTTP server as a service on windows.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_HTTPSERVER.PUB.ACTION.UNINSTALL_SERVICE_WINDOWS * Action Description: This action uninstalls the Apache HTTP server installed as a Windows service.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_HTTPSERVER.PUB.ACTION.START_SERVER * Action Description: This action starts Apache HTTP server.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_HTTPSERVER.PUB.ACTION.STOP_SERVER * Action Description: This action stops the Apache HTTP server gracefully.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_HTTPSERVER.PUB.ACTION.RESTART_SERVER * Action Description: This action restarts the Apache HTTP server.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_HTTPSERVER.PUB.ACTION.EXECUTE_COMMAND * Action Description: This action runs any ad hoc apache http command.
